mapper.insert: insert into product_q (product_q_id, product_q_question, product_id, customer_id, product_q_createdate, product_q_title) values (#{id}, #{question}, #{product.id}, #{customer.id}, sysdate, #{title})
mapper.select:
select P.product_q_id as id, P.product_q_question as question, P.product_id as "product.id", P.customer_id as "customer.id", P.product_q_createdate as createDate, P.product_q_deleted as deleted, P.product_q_title as title, C.customer_username as "customer.username"
from product_q P, customers C where P.customer_id = C.customer_id and P.product_q_deleted = 'N' order by P.product_q_id desc

select product_q_id as id, product_q_question as question, product_id as "product.id", customer_id as "customer.id", product_q_createdate as createDate, product_q_deleted as deleted, product_q_title as title from product_q where product_q_id = #{value}

select count(*) from product_q P, customers C where P.customer_id = C.customer_id and P.product_q_deleted = 'N'
and P.product_q_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
